attributes.additional_details: At the moment Footballers are paid far too much income per week. Footballers get paid anything up to £200,000 per week for playing a Football match for 90 minutes and that the Government should do something about how much the Footballers should be paid per week or year. For example the Government should introduce a cap of £60,000 per week or £100,000 per year

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA.
